list.name: Changes
list.comment:
we figured out how to use django's test environment (finally), and we've verified that the user login system does indeed accept valid username/password combos.
further tests to do are - check that valid usernames with wrong passwords are denied - check that invalid usernames are denied - check that valid usernames are not compatible with other user's passwords
:)

task.summary:
created LocationBin and LocationFountain models, and migrated them to the database
- nevan

pushing migration files because they weren't pushed with my previous commit for some reason
- nevan

pair programming sesh. made a start on tests for users, not finished yet (jessie had a lecture)
- jessie and nevan

some very work-in-progress code, pushing so jessie can access it
- nevan

we figured out how to use django's test environment (finally), and we've verified that the user login system does indeed accept valid username/password combos.
further tests to do are - check that valid usernames with wrong passwords are denied - check that invalid usernames are denied - check that valid usernames are not compatible with other user's passwords
:)
